title: Pakistan Rangers carry out emergency rescue operation to assist flood victims
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 24 (APP):Pakistan Rangers (Punjab), in coordination with other institutions, carried out an emergency rescue operation for flood victims in border areas.
In the Kasur districtâ€™s Ganda Singh Wala area, Rangers personnel safely evacuated people trapped in floodwaters to safe locations.
Video Playerhttps://www.app.com.pk/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/WhatsApp-Video-2025-08-24-at-20.52.02.mp400:0000:0000:00Use Up/Down Arrow keys to increase or decrease volume.
During the rescue operation, the belongings of the victims were also shifted safely.
In view of the flood situation, Rangers remain in constant contact with other rescue agencies.
Punjab Rangers personnel are prepared to carry out relief activities to deal with any emergency.
